titleInfo.title: 7th Annual White Oak Mountain Bluegrass Festival (2007)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (brown and green on brown) announcing the Seventh Annual White Oak Mountain Bluegrass Festival with Rhonda Vincent and The Rage, The Grascals, The Lewis Family, Carrie Hassleer and Hard Rain, Forge Mountain Diggers and others at the Tri-State Exhibition Center on July 14 and 15. Poster features a woodcut of a tree.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
